sourceDescription: This data collection consists of baptism records from over 10,000 Church of England parish registers (including Bishopâ€™s Transcripts) in the Greater London area. These are taken from the registers held at London Metropolitan Archives as well as those formerly at Guildhall Manuscripts Section. It also includes registers of births and baptisms that occurred in workhouses operated by the Boards of Guardians. Learn more...
